Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory548.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Com—man—dant, are you hurt?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A Construct's head peeks over the cliff edge, shouting down to the two caught in the net."}
{2: "I'm fine. How's the operation going on your side?", 3: '8'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'The refugee camp has been secured. The operation is going smoothly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "The commotion you created successfully diverted the guards' attention. Thanks to that, we were able to take control before they got to harm the hostages.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'But...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'The hostages had been given injections or oral medications for a long time, probably as a way to control them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "Those medications have significantly damaged their brains and nervous systems, and it's likely irreversible.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lamia senses a slight tremor in the human's hand."}
{2: "Where's the nearest major medical depot?", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Let me check...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "Shouldn't you have them send down a rope to pull us up first?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lamia's voice emerges weakly, her spirits struggling to keep up with the overwhelming series of events."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'm so exhausted that I can't even move a finger.", 3: '24'}
{2: 'Give me some time to catch my breath...', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "You've worked really hard. It must be tough.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia "sincerely" expresses her "gratitude" to the human.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory548.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Commandant, give me your hand.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Extend hand)', 3: '32'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: "With the help of the human's teammate, the two get to set their feet back to solid ground."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Commandant, you can feel free to take off the stuff on your face now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the bandages and faux skin removed, the face that Lamia has glimpsed only a few times but remembers vividly is unveiled before her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Seems to have lost some weight?)', 4: '18'}
{3: "In contrast to Lamia's recollection, the human before her appears noticeably thinner, their cheekbones prominent and jawline sharply defined."}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "I'm glad to see you alright. You really shouldn't have taken on such a dangerous mission right after your recovery.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We're shorthanded, so anything would help.", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'But going undercover without carrying weapons or communication devices was still too dangerous.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Thankfully, we were able to assess your safety every day through the signals you sent using sunlight reflecting off a mirror.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'How did you come up with that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'From experience, I guess...', 3: '50'}
{3: "Noticing the commandant's lack of interest in the topic, the Purifying Force recruit turns his gaze toward Lamia hiding behind."}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'This is...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Due to the limited information transmitted through reflected sunlight, the recruit was unaware of Lamia's existence beforehand."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'Elene... My name is Elene.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lamia hides behind the Gray Raven Commandant, completely avoiding the Construct's gaze."}
{2: 'She was also new to the refugee camp.', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Those bastards! They even got their hands on children!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct raises his fist in anger, throwing a few punches into the air.'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Then, where should we settle her for now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Just to be safe, let's also take her to a medical depot for a check-up first.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'The nearest one is 20 kilometers from us, and we can reach it by land.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "I'll go drive the vehicle over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh... I almost forgot.', 3: '70'}
{3: 'The human turns around, crouching down to eye level with Lamia, who is disguised as a child.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Elene, let me introduce myself again.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'My real name is 【kuroname】.', 3: '74'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(I've known this all along...)", 4: '18'}
{3: "Seeing Lamia's awkward smile, the human before her clears throat softly."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Ahem... Sorry that I lied to you.', 3: '82'}
{2: 'But it was to ensure your safety.', 3: '83'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(After all, I did the same to you.)', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'Commandant, the vehicle is ready.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct recruit peeks out from the vehicle.'}
{3: 'A hand, revealing distinctly jointed fingers and faint blue veins without the bandages, extends toward Lamia.'}
{3: "Despite Lamia's initial intent to flee, an inexplicable urge compels her to reach out and grasp that hand."}
{3: 'Perhaps it was due to the solace and embrace under the stars.'}
{3: 'Perhaps it was due to the gentleness she felt during the past few days.'}
{3: 'Or perhaps it was due to the unwavering protection it offered regardless of the physical toll it went through.'}
{3: 'At this moment, Lamia feels a surge of covetousness—an unusual desire for something she has never felt before. This impulse overrides her typical indecisiveness, compelling her to yield.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(I'll follow for now and look for a chance to escape later.)", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'Where are we going?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "You're in luck, little lady. The nearest medical depot is in the Clean Zone. You'll be absolutely safe there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'To the Clean...', 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't know about the Clean Zone?", 3: '113'}
{3: "Misunderstanding Lamia's reaction, the human begins to explain in simple terms that a child can understand."}
{3: 'An area completely free of the Punishing Virus, monitored by several large outposts at its edges.'}
{3: 'It can be considered the safest area on Earth... for humans.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(I know it too well!)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(What should I do? If I enter the Clean Zone, I won't be able to control the Punishing Virus, and my disguise will completely fail.)", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Then I'll really become a fish on their chopping board.)", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Actually... I still have some things left behind at the camp...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "Don't worry. We will carefully organize and store everything that remains in the camp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'After all, there might be something that can be used as evidence. You can claim it after we regroup with the main force.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "As long as there's no evidence that needs to be retained, we'll return it after inspection.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: "Though we're all new recruits, you can trust us to handle things.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Construct leans on the car window and gives Lamia a thumbs-up.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "You're so reliable... Ah-haha...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia forces out a dry laugh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Should I remove my disguise here...)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia looks up, meeting the gaze of the human who still wears a caring and attentive expression.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Don't worry. It'll be very safe there.", 3: '140'}
{2: "I'll be with you.", 3: '141'}
{3: "If she were to reveal her true identity at this moment, the gentleness and care she sees in the human's eyes, which was born from falsehood, would likely vanish."}
{3: "For the first time, Lamia's thoughts extend beyond mere survival. She desires to live, yet she also feels the weighty hesitation over shattering the fragile illusion."}
{3: 'Faced with this dilemma, she instinctively starts to step back.'}
{2: 'Wait, behind you is...!', 3: '145'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a deafening clash of rocks and steel reverberates through the air, and the black cliff rocks start to break apart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Recruit', 3: 'The pile driver holding the net went haywire?! Punishing? How come it suddenly shows up here?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In just a moment, Lamia loses her footing. Succumbing to the accelerating force of her fall, she closes her eyes.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory548.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory548.jpg'}
{3: 'If unable to make a choice, she will resort to an escape, just like she always does, marking the definitive end of this lie.'}
{3: 'The mermaid, bound by her inability to reveal the truth, is destined to dissolve into foam and return to the sea.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(It'll be fine, just like before...)", 4: '18'}
{3: "Once she falls into the sea, she can disappear without a trace, becoming an insignificant passerby in that person's life."}
{3: 'The commandant will probably feel guilty for a long time for not being able to find her. As Lamia ponders this possibility, a sense of unease takes hold within her.'}
{1: '1', 3: "However, Lamia's fall is suddenly halted as a hand tightly grips onto hers."}
{3: 'The hand before her appears so fragile, and all she needs is a gentle squeeze to crush it.'}
{3: 'But it also possesses an unbreakable strength, never letting go, even with all the bones crushed.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Why do you have to go to such lengths...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, the human remains silent, perhaps because the loud sea wind has blurred her words.'}
{3: 'Or perhaps because all their focus is on the protruding rock clutched tightly in their right hand, the only support against gravity for both of them.'}
{3: 'Drip, drip...'}
{3: "Bright red blood drops from the human's palm, splattering onto Lamia's face."}
{3: 'Along with it fall the overburdened rock and the two, now without a foothold.'}
